name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
description: Als je de Wii U™ versie download, kan je de Nintendo 3DS™ versie gratis ontvangen! (Je Wii U en Nintendo 3DS moeten gekoppeld zijn aan dezelfde Nintendo Network ID.) Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six new games! Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and intuitive touch-screen controls. Get extra challenges by touching any amiibo™ to generate special puzzles, just for you! The puzzles included are: Word Maze Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze! Mixups A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together! One Word The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find! Flowers Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle. Circles Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all! Crossovers Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure! Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig. De NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS zal later dit jaar beschikbaar komen.
